eventdescription:
Server Backup was started at this time.
\rEvents can use HTML tags. Use it with caution!\rCheck used CSV files here:
  • events.csv
  • metrics.csv

Out Of Memory detected.
\r(Multiple hostname/s, eventname/s and date formats are supported on same CSV file:
  • %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S
  • %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z
  • %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S
  • %Y-%m-%d %H:%M
  • %Y-%m-%d %H
  • %Y-%m-%d
\rCheck used CSV files here:
  • events.csv
  • metrics.csv

Database connections is greater than 120.
\rYou can also add additional metrics using -m custommetrics.csv parameter.\rCheck used CSV files here:
  • events.csv
  • metrics.csv
